overview: Author and teacher Drunvalo Melchizedek leads this thought-provoking examination of a variety of Mayan "mysteries," including the disappearance of the Mayan people hundreds of years ago. According to Melchizedek, the Maya didn't die out at all; they're simply existing in another dimension. He also discusses the concept of cellular memory, the rise of Father Sun and humanity's potential for telepathic power.
title: Drunvalo Melchizedek: Mayan Mysteries
